00012 const CMessageTask::message_map_entry_t CMessageTask::s_message_map[] = {
00013               { NULL_MSG, NULL }
00014 };
00015 
00016 CMessageTask::CMessageTask()
00017 {
00018        m_pDelegate = NULL;
00019        m_nTimeOut = portMAX_DELAY;
00020 }
00021

00023        // TODO Auto-generated destructor stub

00025 
00026 portBASE_TYPE CMessageTask::OnCreate(const portCHAR * const pcName, unsigned portSHORT usStackDepth, unsigned portBASE_TYPE uxPriority) {
00027        portBASE_TYPE res;
00028        res = m_queue.Create(CMessageTask::MESSAGE_QUEUE_SIZE, sizeof(char[20])).IsValid();
00029 
00030        return res;
00031 }
00032 
00033 void CMessageTask::Run() {
00034 
00035        // call task specific initialization code.
00036         if ( !OnInit() ) {
00037 #if INCLUDE_vTaskDelete == 1
00038                Delete();
00039                return;
00040 #else
00041         // The task must not start due to initialization problem, but the FreeRTOS
00042         // vTaskDelete function is not defined by configuration file. Suspend the task.
00043                Suspend();
00044 #endif
00045         }
00046 
00047        CMessage msg;
00048        for (;;) {
00049 
00050               if ( m_queue.Receive(&msg, m_nTimeOut) == pdTRUE ) {
00051                      // Message Handling routine
00052 
00053                      // Call the delegate, if one, before try to dispatch the event
00054                      if (m_pDelegate) m_pDelegate->OnHandleEvent(msg);
00055                      DispatchMessage(msg);
00056                      // Call the delegate, if one, after tried to dispatch the event
00057                      if (m_pDelegate) m_pDelegate->DidHandleEvent(msg);
00058               }
00059               else {
00060                      // TODO: STF - timeout expired.
00061                      OnTimeOut();
00062               }
00063        }
00064 }
00065 
00066 void CMessageTask::DispatchMessage(const CMessage &msg) {
00067        for (int i=0; s_message_map[i].id!=NULL_MSG; ++i) {
00068               if (s_message_map[i].id == msg.m_nId) {
00069                      (this->*s_message_map[i].MessageHandler)(msg.wParam);
00070                      break;
00071               }
00072        }
00073 }
00074 
00075 bool CMessageTask::PostMessage(CMessage *pMsg, portTickType nTicksToWait/*=portMAX_DELAY*/) {
00076        return (bool)m_queue.Send(pMsg, nTicksToWait);
00077 }
00078 
00079 bool CMessageTask::PostMessageFromISR(CMessage *pMsg, portBASE_TYPE *pxHigherPriorityTaskWoken) {
00080        return (bool)m_queue.SendFromISR(pMsg, pxHigherPriorityTaskWoken);
00081 }
00082 
00083 bool CMessageTask::SendMessage(CMessage *pMsg, portTickType nTicksToWait/*=portMAX_DELAY*/) {
00084        return (bool)m_queue.SendToFront(pMsg, nTicksToWait);
00085 }
00086 
00087 bool CMessageTask::SenfFromISR(CMessage *pMsg, portBASE_TYPE * pxHigherPriorityTaskWoken) {
00088        return (bool)m_queue.SendToFrontFromISR(pMsg, pxHigherPriorityTaskWoken);
00089 }
